嚱字的基本解释

嚱
xī
叹词：“噫吁嚱，危乎高哉！”
口哨声。

嚱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《集韻》虚宜切，平支，曉。］
叹词。
[②]［xì］
［《廣韻》香義切，去寘，曉。］
(1)形容叹息声。
(2)叹息。

嚱字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嚱； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页213第48
【集韻】虛宜切，音犧。【玉篇】吹嚱，口聲。　又【集韻】嗚嚱，歎辭。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?香義切，音戲。【集韻】嚱嚱，聲也。

嚱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嚱字的起名意思

暂无。

嚱
Basic explanation of words
嚱
xī
Interjection: "Hey, hey, the danger is high!"
Whistle.
嚱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Jiyun" is empty and suitable for cutting, flat branch, and dawn. ]
interjection.
[②]［xì］
["Guangyun" Xiangyi cut, go to set, Xiao. ]
(1) Describe the sound of sighs.
(2) Sigh.
嚱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嚱; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 213 to 48
【Jiyun】Empty should be cut, sound sacrificed. [Jade articles] Blow and speak.　[Jiyun] Woo, sigh.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Xiang Yi cut, sound drama. [Jiyun] 嚱嚱, the sound is also.
